title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Combine spaghetti with pancetta and egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices for 1 hour.
Sauté onion until golden, add tomatoes and simmer.
Add grilled chicken and cream, simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A colorful mix of fresh vegetables sautéed in a savory sauce.
instructions: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat sesame oil in a pan.
Add vegetables and stir fry for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes.
Serve immediately with rice or noodles.
